column4: why isn't anyone of any help in here for the past 2 days.. I know someone uses xmms
what is the problem
trying to get xmms-wma pluging to work for xmms to play .wma songs.. I can't get it to work
you need to install the w32codecs
i have w32codecs installed
so you can play a wma file in another player?
NO :(
my gf copied it right off from a disc.. Do you think they are encrypted and thats why?
what is a gf? can you play another media file ? look at your home folder for the link to Examples
gf means girl friend.. And I can play all files/ codecs but .wma kaffine doesn't, amorak doesn't, xmm doesn't vlc im not sure about..
you can find it here and install with alien http://mcmcc.bat.ru/xmms-wma/
why do ya want me to dl it again if I already have it installed?
im on 2.1KB takes me long time to dl the smallest of proggies
so you have it installed, ah ok
yah ive told u I had xmms-wma and w32codecs installed, all media format plays but .wma
what gives ls -l over that wma file?
care to be more specific on ls- l?
ok, open a terminal, go to the place where your wma file is stored with the cd command. than in your music map do the ls -l command to see what the rights are
thats the problem I have no idea where the xmms-wma got installed 2
I was talking about the wma-file
I did what you asked and it says -r--r--r-- 2 root root
your rights are good for this, I can't hep you further maybe someone else can
